channel.title: Dessert on SimplyDelicio.us
channel.description: Recent content in Dessert on SimplyDelicio.us

item.title: Tangy Lime Cream Cookies
item.description: Buttery cookies with a tangy lime filling that are perfectly buttery, sweet, and tangy

item.title: GIANT Snickerdoodle Cupcake Cookies
item.description: Enormous Snickerdoodle cupcake cookies with cream cheese icing

item.title: White Chocolate Raspberry Cookies
item.description: Decadent white chocolate cookies infused with tangy raspberry jam, topped with a sweet drizzle

item.title: Apple Cake
item.description: A moist and flavorful apple cake with almonds, topped with whipped heavy cream mixed with cinnamon and sugar

item.title: Pumpkin Roll
item.description: A fall-favorite spiced pumpkin cake roll with a creamy cream cheese filling

item.title: Cinnamon Rolls
item.description: Incredibly soft and perfectly sweet overnight yeast cinnamon rolls

item.title: Lemon Bars
item.description: A tangy and sweet lemon bar recipe perfect for any occasion

item.title: Cinnamon Roll Cheesecake
item.description: A delicious thick and creamy cheesecake with a ribbon of cinnamon running through it, topped off with cream cheese icing

item.title: Classic Cheesecake
item.description: A delicious creamy no-frills cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust

item.title: Classic Carrot Cake Cupcakes with a Cream Cheese Frosting
item.description: A delicious and moist carrot cake cupcake topped with a rich cream cheese frosting

item.title: Giant Sugar Cookies
item.description: ENORMOUS sugar cookies topped with a creamy, sweet almond icing

item.title: Anise Sugar Cookies
item.description: Delicious and buttery sugar cookies with a hint of vanilla and anise

item.title: Apple Crumb Pie
item.description: Tart and crisp apple pie with a sweet crumble topping and buttery crust

item.title: Apple Streusel Cheesecake Bars
item.description: Sweet and sugary apple streusel cheesecake bar recipe

item.title: Dirt Cake
item.description: A fun and delicious Halloween-inspired parfait dessert resembling dirt

item.title: Pretzel Salad
item.description: A delightful sweet and salty dessert salad with a pretzel crust, creamy filling, and fruity raspberry layer
